info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Siskiyou County through 1030 PM PDT... At 959 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron, or 18 miles east of Yreka, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montague and Highway 97 Grass Lake And Mount Hebron. This includes US 97 in California between mile markers 18 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
